system.requirements:
Tier 1; Intelligence 40
Aptitudes: Leadership, Fieldcraft, Tzeentch
system.effect:
All Squad Members, including the character, add +1 to Initiative Rolls.
Any Squad Members may choose to use the Intelligence Bonus of this Character for their Initiative Rolls rather than their own Agility Bonus.
